content: आविष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Entered. {@--2@} Possessed (by an evil spirit); <ls>K. 120</ls>, <ls n="K.">167</ls>, <ls n="K.">318.</ls> {@--3@} Possessed of, seized or filled with, full of, overpowered or overcome; भय°, क्रोध°, निद्रा°; कृपयाविष्टं <ls>Bg. 2. 1</ls>; भोगिनः कंचुकाविष्टाः <ls>Pt. 1. 65</ls> covered with, clad in. {@--4@} Engrossed or occupied in, intent on (तत्पर, उद्युत्क).
